thread.title: Kallem wins girls race at Triad Invitational
thread.title_full: Kallem wins girls race at Triad Invitational

title: Kallem wins girls race at Triad Invitational
text: Kallem wins girls race at Triad Invitational Marion's Shelby Kallem was the girls winner at the Triad Invitational on Wednesday Comment   Writer Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 1:14 AM Posted Oct. 1, 2015 at 1:14 AM TROY â€” Marion's Shelby Kallem was the girls winner at the Triad Invitational on Wednesday. Kallem finished in 19:11.24 to edge Triad's Abigail Richter by a second at the finish line. Marion's Sydney Kallem was 11th (20:28.03), followed by Marissa Basi (31st, 22:17.81) and Quincy Gordon (83rd, 24:22.60). In the boys race, Marion's Zach Young was sixth overall in 17:00.82 and Jade Chew was 10th in 17:18.41. Carbondale's Atlantis Green was the winner in 16:14.05. Other runners for Marion were Ryan Melvin (17th, 17:44.0), Julian McPhail (31st, 18:08.40), A.J. Segers (66th, 19:05.15), Peyton Robison (83rd, 10:26.17), Tim Surburg (93rd, 19:40.23) and Lucas Moake (96th, 19:41.29). Marion runs again Saturday in Peoria.   Writer
